mapper.select: select s.su_no, s.title, s.enrolldate, m.name, l.title lec_title from insertSurvey s ,lecture l, member m where s.lec_no=l.lec_no And s.m_no=m.m_no And s.lec_no=#{lec_no} and s.m_no=l.m_no

select s.su_no, s.title, s.enrolldate, m.name, l.title lec_title, sq.issurvey from insertSurvey s ,lecture l, member m , surveyquestion sq, myclass mc where s.lec_no=l.lec_no And s.m_no=m.m_no And l.m_no=s.m_no And mc.m_no=sq.m_no And s.su_no=sq.su_no And s.lec_no=#{lec_no} and mc.m_no=#{m_no} And mc.lec_no=#{lec_no} And sq.sq_no=1
mapper.insert: insert into surveyquestion values (#{sq_no}, seq_insertsurvey.currval,#{m_no}, #{question}, null, 'N')
mapper.select: select sq.su_no, sq.sq_no, sq.question, ie.title, ie.enrolldate from surveyquestion sq, insertsurvey ie where sq.m_no=#{m_no} and sq.su_no=#{su_no} and sq.su_no=ie.su_no
select sq.m_no, m.name from surveyquestion sq, member m where su_no=#{su_no} and issurvey='Y' and m.m_no=sq.m_no and sq_no=1
select sq.m_no, m.name from surveyquestion sq, member m where su_no=#{su_no} and issurvey='N' and m.m_no=sq.m_no and sq_no=1
select m_no, question, answer from surveyquestion where sq_no=#{sq_no} And su_no=#{su_no} And issurvey='Y'

select sum(answer) from surveyquestion where question in (select question from surveyquestion where su_no=#{su_no}) and sq_no in (select sq_no from surveyquestion where su_no=#{su_no}) and issurvey='Y' and sq_no=#{sq_no}

select mc.m_no from surveyquestion sq, insertsurvey iq , lecture l , myclass mc where sq.sq_no=1 And sq.m_no=mc.m_no And iq.su_no=#{su_no} And sq.su_no=iq.su_no And iq.lec_no=l.lec_no And l.lec_no=mc.lec_no
